alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Harrison; Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 6:21PM CDT until June 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Harrison County in southern Mississippi... Hancock County in southern Mississippi... Pearl River County in southern Mississippi... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 620 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Poplarville to 12 miles east of Mcneil to near Picayune, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Long Beach, Picayune, Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Poplarville, Diamondhead, Kiln, Lyman, Shoreline Park, Saucier, Mcneil and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 8 and 37. Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 3 and 36. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
